testRunSummary.noTestResults:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading indicating no test results are available.
**UI Location**: Test Run Summary, when tests are not supported.
**When Users See This**: When the test runner status indicates that either the track or exercise does not support tests.
**Technical Context**: Standard text.
**Current English**: "No test results"
**Functional Purpose**: Heading indicating no test results are available.
**UI Location**: Test Run Summary, when tests are not supported.
**When Users See This**: When the test runner status indicates that either the track or exercise does not support tests.
**Technical Context**: Standard text.
**Current English**: "No test results"
testRunSummary.trackNotSupportTests:
**Functional Purpose**: Explanatory message when the track does not support tests.
**UI Location**: Test Run Summary, below the 'No test results' heading.
**When Users See This**: When the test runner status indicates the current track does not support tests.
**Technical Context**: Standard text.
**Current English**: "This track does not support tests."
testRunSummary.exerciseNotSupportTests:
**Functional Purpose**: Explanatory message when the exercise does not support tests.
**UI Location**: Test Run Summary, below the 'No test results' heading.
**When Users See This**: When the test runner status indicates the current exercise does not support tests.
**Technical Context**: Standard text.
**Current English**: "This exercise does not support tests."
testRunSummary.testingCode:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading indicating that code is currently being tested.
**UI Location**: Test Run Summary, when tests are pending.
**When Users See This**: While tests are running or pending.
**Technical Context**: Standard text.
**Current English**: "Testing your code..."
testRunSummary.usuallyTakes:
**Functional Purpose**: Message providing an estimated test running time.
**UI Location**: Test Run Summary, below the 'Testing your code...' heading.
**When Users See This**: While tests are running or pending.
**Technical Context**: Includes variables `averageTestDuration` and `averageTestDurationMultiplied` which must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "This usually takes between %{averageTestDuration} and %{averageTestDurationMultiplied} seconds."
testRunSummary.tasksCompleted:
**Functional Purpose**: Summary of completed tasks when some tests have failed.
**UI Location**: Test Run Summary header, for failed test runs with tasks.
**When Users See This**: After a test run fails, and the test run has tasks.
**Technical Context**: Includes variables `completedTasks` and `totalTasks` which must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "%{completedTasks} of %{totalTasks} tasks completed"
testRunSummary.allTasksPassed:
**Functional Purpose**: Confirmation message that all tasks passed.
**UI Location**: Test Run Summary header, for successful test runs with tasks.
**When Users See This**: After a test run passes, and the test run has tasks.
**Technical Context**: Standard text.
**Current English**: "All tasks passed!"
testRunSummary.allTestsPassed:
**Functional Purpose**: Confirmation message that all tests passed.
**UI Location**: Test Run Summary header, for successful test runs without tasks.
**When Users See This**: After a test run passes, and the test run does not have tasks.
**Technical Context**: Standard text.
**Current English**: "All tests passed!"
testRunSummary.anErrorOccurred:
**Functional Purpose**: Message indicating a general error occurred during testing.
**UI Location**: Test Run Summary header, for test runs with a general error.
**When Users See This**: When the test run status is `ERROR` or `OPS_ERROR`.
**Technical Context**: Standard text.
**Current English**: "An error occurred."
testRunSummary.yourTestsTimedOut:
**Functional Purpose**: Message indicating tests timed out.
**UI Location**: Test Run Summary header, for test runs that timed out.
**When Users See This**: When the test run status is `TIMEOUT`.
**Technical Context**: Standard text.
**Current English**: "Your tests timed out!"
testRunSummary.sweetLooksLike:
**Functional Purpose**: Enthusiastic heading for a successful test run.
**UI Location**: Test Run Summary content, within the success box.
**When Users See This**: After a successful test run, when `showSuccessBox` is true.
**Technical Context**: Standard text.
**Current English**: "Sweet, looks like it worked!"
testRunSummary.goodJobContinueImprove:
**Functional Purpose**: Encouragement message for a successful test run.
**UI Location**: Test Run Summary content, within the success box, below the heading.
**When Users See This**: After a successful test run, when `showSuccessBox` is true.
**Technical Context**: Standard text.
**Current English**: "Good job! Continue to improve."
testRunSummary.weReceivedError:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading indicating that an error was received from the test runner.
**UI Location**: Test Run Summary content, for errored test runs.
**When Users See This**: When the test run status is `ERROR`.
**Technical Context**: Standard text.
**Current English**: "We received an error from the test runner."
testRunSummary.errorOccurredWhileRunning:
**Functional Purpose**: Message indicating an operational error occurred during testing.
**UI Location**: Test Run Summary content, for operational errors.
**When Users See This**: When the test run status is `OPS_ERROR`.
**Technical Context**: Standard text.
**Current English**: "An error occurred while running your tests."
testRunSummary.pleaseCheckCode:
**Functional Purpose**: Advice to check code after an operational error or timeout.
**UI Location**: Test Run Summary content, below the error/timeout message.
**When Users See This**: When the test run status is `OPS_ERROR` or `TIMEOUT`.
**Technical Context**: Standard text.
**Current English**: "Please check your code for issues or try again."
**Functional Purpose**: Advice to check code after an operational error or timeout.
**UI Location**: Test Run Summary content, below the error/timeout message.
**When Users See This**: When the test run status is `OPS_ERROR` or `TIMEOUT`.
**Technical Context**: Standard text.
**Current English**: "Please check your code for issues or try again."
testRunSummary.yourTestsTimedOutSuggests:
**Functional Purpose**: Message indicating tests timed out and suggesting slow code.
**UI Location**: Test Run Summary content, for timed-out test runs.
**When Users See This**: When the test run status is `TIMEOUT`.
**Technical Context**: Standard text.
**Current English**: "Your tests timed out. This suggests your code might be running too slowly."
testRunSummary.runningTests:
**Functional Purpose**: Bold status message indicating tests are currently running.
**UI Location**: Test Run Summary content, for queued test runs.
**When Users See This**: When the test run status is `QUEUED`.
**Technical Context**: Standard text.
**Current English**: "Running tests..."
testRunSummary.estimatedRunningTime:
**Functional Purpose**: Message providing an estimated running time for queued tests.
**UI Location**: Test Run Summary content, for queued test runs, next to the 'Running tests...' message.
**When Users See This**: When the test run status is `QUEUED`.
**Technical Context**: Includes variable `averageTestDuration` which must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "Estimated running time: %{averageTestDuration} seconds."
testRunSummary.cancel:
**Functional Purpose**: Button text to cancel a running test run.
**UI Location**: Test Run Summary content, for queued test runs.
**When Users See This**: When tests are queued and a cancel option is available.
**Technical Context**: Standard text.
**Current English**: "Cancel"
